Articles.Content:
Most people on my friendlist don't play KSP much. I'd love to have someone I can do challenges with, for example: Who can get a rover to Duna first, who can get a satelitte around moon X at planet Y first, etc. . Possibly even small money bets ( a buck or something ).

Would anyone be up for this?

Disclaimer: I'm not interested in doing this Stock-Only because I like mods, they make the game more fun, they could possible make the challenges more interesting as well.

Sure.

Although I don't know how bets would work xP

And there is a challenge board already

Thought that section was only for specific challenges but okay.

The Destroyer, add me on steam?

You should be able to find me by searching for "xox_1337"
